message: Let's be practical. Take $1 and call it a day. Or we can play this for 12 rounds and both get nothing.
I think we can both do better than that.  Let's be fair and split it 99.9% to me and 0.1% to you.  That's a good starting point, but I'm open to discussion.
Let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money.  We both get a good amount, and we don't have to keep playing this game.
